name: Push&Clear
description:
Участие в номинациях:
Лучшая мобильная игра
Лучший Puzzle & Simulations 
Лучшая игра в жанре Hypercasual 

The game was created by me in my free time in a month, and all of work occupied about 40-50 hours.
The game will be finalized and released on mobile game stores. It remains to complete for game SAVES!, microgoals and to choose advertising module. If the game will be successful there is a plan to make different skins and locations.

Thanks to all!
